biotools.summary: ExOrthist is a Nextflow based pipeline to infer exon orthology groups at all evolutionary distances. As a crucial innovation, ExOrthist sequentially evaluates three features when inferring exon homologous relationships: conservation of up/downstream intron positions and phases, conservation of the exon sequence, and conservation of the up/downstream exon sequences.
